snippet.title: RADIO EXURBIA Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Download now and go for a rip: https://sprawlstudios.itch.io/radio-exurbia

Radio Exurbia is a driving game about music and discovery as you explore a surreal landscape of twisted suburbs and sentient muscle cars. Use your Reality-Modulating radio to swap between worlds as you experience the stability of suburbia and the sublime excitement of the unknown, all set to a high-octane original soundtrack. Turn the key, tune in and swap worlds.

Created by Jimi Stine and Michael Wahba
With original music by James Morrell and Tahir Ali

Made at USC Games in collaboration with the Berklee College of Music
